Class Deck

java.lang.Object
edu.wit.scds.ds.lists.app.card_game.universal_base.pile.PileBase
edu.wit.scds.ds.lists.app.card_game.standard_cards.pile.Pile
edu.wit.scds.ds.lists.app.card_game.standard_cards.pile.Deck
All Implemented Interfaces:
Iterable<CardBase>
public final class Deck extends Pile
Representation of a standard deck of cards containing
  • 4 suits: Clubs, Diamonds, Hearts, Spades
  • 13 ranks: Ace, 2..9, Jack, Queen, King
  • 2 Jokers

this is the source of all cards available to the game

Version:
1.0 2025-06-26 Initial implementation (extracted from Deck), 1.1 2025-07-13 make the number of playing cards per deck available, 1.2 2025-11-19 add support for a template collection of Cards
Author:
Dave Rosenberg

  • Constructor Details

    • Deck

      public Deck()
      Initialize a deck of cards with default number of Jokers and default card orientation - the cards are in the order as specified by createPlayingCards()

    • Deck

      public Deck(int numberOfJokers)
      Initialize a deck of cards including a specified number of Jokers and default card orientation
      the cards are in sorted order
      Parameters:
      numberOfJokers - the desired number of jokers to add to the deck

    • Deck

      public Deck(Orientation initialOrientation)
      Initialize a deck of cards including a default number of Jokers and specified card orientation
      the cards are in sorted order
      Parameters:
      initialOrientation - indicate face up or face down

    • Deck

      public Deck(Orientation initialOrientation, int numberOfJokers)
      Initialize a deck of cards including a specified number of Jokers and card orientation
      the cards are in sorted order
      Parameters:
      initialOrientation - indicate face up or face down
      numberOfJokers - the desired number of jokers to add to the deck

    • Deck

      private Deck(Persistence persistence)
      Initialize a deck of cards with specified persistence, default number of Jokers, and default card orientation
      the cards are in the order as specified by createPlayingCards()

      This constructor provides a reliable mechanism to instantiate the template deck

      Parameters:
      persistence - usually Persistence.TEMPLATE

  • Method Details

    • createJokers

      private void createJokers(int numberOfJokers)
      Add the specified number of Joker cards to the deck
      Parameters:
      numberOfJokers - the desired number of Jokers to add to the deck

    • createPlayingCards

      private void createPlayingCards()
      Instantiate all the playing cards in a new deck
      • cards are generated by rank within suit
      • jokers are excluded

    • populateDeck

      private void populateDeck()
      build a deck of cards using the template cards

    • populateDeck

      private void populateDeck(Orientation initialOrientation, int numberOfJokers, Persistence persistence)
      Initialize a deck of cards including a specified number of Jokers and card orientation
      the cards are in sorted order
      Parameters:
      initialOrientation - indicate face up or face down
      numberOfJokers - the desired number of jokers to add to the deck
      persistence - controls the cards' persistence (permanent or template)

    • validateDeck

      public void validateDeck() throws IllegalStateException
      ensure that this deck contains the all the cards it had when instantiated and nothing else
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if any cards are missing or contains any stray cards

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)
      (optional) test driver
      Parameters:
      args - -unused-
